did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Communist Party, New York State Committee Miscellaneous Documents, 1937

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Communist Party, New York State Committee

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Miscellaneous documents of the New York State Committee of the Communist Party.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of miscellaneous documents of the New York State Committee of the Communist Party. Included are correspondence, reports, and draft resolutions.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Communist Party of the United States of America (New York)

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Communist Party, New York State Committee Miscellaneous Documents #5465. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Restricted originals of correspondence, reports, and draft resolutions
